1.title: Dad Food
1.plot: Dads everywhere will be satisfied with the Deen's delicious Dad Food meal!

2.title: Deli Delights
2.plot: Savannah chef Alan Nowell joins Paula to cook up some delicious deli treats.

3.title: Menu for My Man
3.plot: Paula cooks up a storm to impress her man, Michael.

4.title: Backyard Wedding
4.plot: Paula shares delicious dishes from her brother's wedding, like chicken salad sliders and spicy oyster shooters.

5.title: Home Sweet Home
5.plot: Paula dishes up her family's favorite recipes, like her grandmother's never-fail pound cake, with her brother Bubba.

7.title: Grilled to Perfection
7.plot: Paula and her son Bobby fire up the grill and make everything from rosemary lambchops to a smoky tomatillo salsa.

8.title: Lovin' in the Oven
8.plot: Paula meets up with Cheryl Day from Savannah's Back in the Day Bakery, and they share delicious recipes both sweet and savory.

9.title: Fireplace Cooking
9.plot: Jim Gay, Food Historian and Chef from Colonial Williamsburg, shows Paula how to cook in the fireplace, like they did in olden times!

10.title: Upside Down
10.plot: This episode is all topsy-turvy! See what "upside down" dishes Paula has to serve up.

12.title: Sweet Somethings
12.plot: It's a cookie show, from butterscotch oatmeal cookies to decadent cookie-dough truffles.

13.title: Paula Does Takeout
13.plot: Paula makes her own versions of classic Chinese takeout dishes.

14.title: Buffet Bonanza
14.plot: Paula and Bobby put together an epic buffet... including a baked potato bar!

15.title: Long Lost Recipes
15.plot: Paula cooks up some favorite "lost" recipes from yesteryear.

16.title: Ladies Who Lunch
16.plot:

1.title: Memory Buffet
1.plot: Paula takes a walk down memory lane and makes classic dishes from her restaurant, The Lady & Sons.

6.title: Paula Goes Italian
6.plot: Paula meets with a local Italian chef to cook up a feast of calzones, cannoli and more.

7.title: Turkey Time
7.plot: Paula's preparing a fabulous Thanksgiving feast with butter-covered roasted turkey, cranberry apple stuffing and more.

8.title: Cater Me This
8.plot: Paula has caterer Susan Mason in the kitchen, and they're catering for themselves with delicious dishes like asparagus quiche and fried oyster spoons.

9.title: Fried Christmas
9.plot: Paula is in the kitchen with her friend Leanne Morgan, and they're deep-frying all their favorite Christmas foods!

10.title: Lovey Dovey Dinner
10.plot: Paula's cooking a romantic meal for her husband, Michael, including a minted lamb shoulder, a cornbread salad and a strawberry cake!

11.title: Deen Night In
11.plot: Paula's having a night in with her son Bobby, and they're making all of his favorite foods!

12.title: Southern Spin
12.plot: Country musician Zac Brown and Paula make some great Southern dishes that have ingredients grown in Georgia.

plot: America's favorite Southern cook 'Paula Deen' (qv) rescues recipes and shares stories.
